patterns.pattern: ^(\w+)'s shoulders tense and hunch, head hanging as a despairing gloom weighs on .+.$
^(\w+) experiences a violent shiver as a shambling myconid lashes out at \w+ with a fungal protrusion\.$
^Helplessly frozen, (\w+) can do naught but scream as a shambling myconid attaches a fungal protrusion to \w+ head\.$
^Your jinx afflicts (\w+) with (\w+)\.$
^(\w+) stops short as something steals .+ attention, .+ expression momentarily mystified as .+ is afflicted with (\w+)\.$
^The rot upon (\w+)'s accursed form grows and spreads, the wasting hex worsening as it feasts upon \w+'?s? lifeforce\.$
^The writhing roots beneath (\w+)'s skin wither and die\.$
^(\w+) wrests \w+ mind free from the Seer's mystifying visions, allowing \w+ control of \w+ body once more\.$
^The psychoactive nature of your morass infects (\w+) with (\w+)\.$
^(\w+)'s body fights off \w+ invasive fungal infection, its magic unable to find nourishment\.$
^(\w+) eyes widen as something unseen captivates .+ attention, .+ mind lost to the mystifying curse plaguing it.$
The Shadow's curse of woe eases from (\w+), .* despairing expression fading away\.$
^(\w+)'s fungal infestation dies out, its magic too weak to maintain its assault\.$
You use Sporulation Omophagia.
^Vile rot chews through (\w+)'s flesh and weakens \w+ musculature, consigning \w+ to lethargy\.$

As the morass grows to truly terrifying proportions, you thread a single strand of enticing life essence into the now ravenous cloud of flesh eating spores set loose by your vernal prowess. The presence of so little nourishment to split between its myriad colonies sets the seething pool of malnourished fungi into a feeding frenzy.
You use Sporulation Omophagia Consume.
^(\w+) airs a shuddering whimper as the pressing darkness afflicts .+ with (\w+)\.$
^(\w+) is already affected by the rot.$
^(\w+) already suffers the effects of a wasting curse.$
^The grim tattoo marking (\w+) as prey fades from .+ hand\.$
